\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 95889}

\subsection*{Blending Without Acetone}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Mike}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & JWH-122 & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & AM-2201 & powder / crystals\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Decided to make an Am-2201, Jwh-122 blend but I didn't want to use acetone or any other chemicals so I tried a better way.



I spread 40 grams of herbs on a baking sheet, got empty spray bottle and filled with water. I sprayed until all herbs were moist, not dripping wet, and sprinkled the chemicals evenly on top. I mixed this up with a fork very well for 5 minutes. 



I smoked some and immediately felt effects in seconds, without harmful chemicals, just natural herbs with RCs.
